website_summaries.verdict: Attractive travel-themed packaging and stunning color choices make this palette a must-have.
pros: Color variety allows for a range of looks, from a classic nude to a dramatic smoky eye
Colors are highly pigmented and blend together seamlessly
Eye shadow has a velvet-like texture and applies smoothly
Extra-large mirror is essential to have while traveling
cons: Travel-themed palette doesn't include a brush

website_summaries.verdict: We love this eyeshadow palette's huge selection of colors in both warm and cool tones that look great and stay put all day.
pros: A generous collection of 21 shades, ranging from neutrals to dark colors
You can  create almost any eye look imaginable with the shimmers, metallics, and mattes
Apply shadows lightly for a flattering wash of color, or build them up for a bold smoky eye
cons: A few of the matte shades are difficult to blend and not as pigmented as the shimmers

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Palette Collection
customer_reviews.text: Like many people, I love eyeshadow palettes and readily admit that I have too many. However, I just needed this UD palette. It arrived quickly and most of the colors are highly pigmented. Sadly, it arrived with two shades shattered (last two on the right, bottom row). Ironically, when that happens, it's always shades that i am really excited about. They are still useable after pressing them a couple times, just have to be more careful with them.
customer_reviews.author: BunnyJ

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pallet
customer_reviews.text: This pallet offers every kind of look you could imagine. The quality of the shadows are outstanding. They blend well, are highly pigmented and are long lasting. This is one of many high end pallets I own, and it's my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reed

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variety to make lots of great looks.
customer_reviews.text: Love all the colors. Would make a great gift for some one who loves eye shadow palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and how they apply. Like this brand overall.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast and as described. It’s a gift so I can’t tell you how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Super pigmented!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors, great for any time of day, or occasion!! 💋
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible careless packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday am horribly dissatisfied! Came with the mirror shattered! For a manufacturer with so many good reviews, I didn't expect such careless packaging... There wasn't a single cushioning layer around the box, no wonder it broke. And they don't even give free replacement 😂 so I am returning the damaged product
customer_reviews.author: MND

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty But Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The value and presentation were the reasons why I ordered. They swatch beautifully too. However, these formulas are not for oily skin. Without primer and a dry brush the color only lasts for 45-60 minutes before I can see it fading on my eyelids. Without primer and a wet brush the color lasts for an extra half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Broken shade
customer_reviews.text: This pallete has great colors and it shipping was super quick. Not sure if I will buy again since 1 shade came in broken but besides that everything is good. The other colors were in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Best palette !
customer_reviews.text: Best palette. Excellent quality. I’ve used it for weeks now and love. Lives up to the hype. Do not regret it one bit. Home run!
customer_reviews.author: Susan mallard

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of protection for safe traveling. Came in, in good time and was just what I ordered. Very satisfied with my order and will more than likely be returning for future purchases. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: keldon

customer_reviews.title: Looove
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite palettes!! Colors are rich and soft and definitely last.
customer_reviews.author: PoSiDiMo

product_meta.title: Urban Decay Born To Run Eyeshadow Palette, 21 Shades - Serious Staying Power & Blendability - Includes Full-Size Mirror
product_meta.description: An all-in-one eyeshadow palette with 21 shades for every possible eye look, from neutral to smoky and bright to sultry.
feature_bullets: GLOBETROTTING GO-TO - The Born To Run Eyeshadow Palette offers endless escapes in one travel-ready package. Choose your own adventure with 21 paraben-free, cruelty-free shades and a full-size mirror.

AWE-INSPIRING SHADES - Palette shades include Breakaway, Stranded, Blaze, Weekend, Still Shot, Riff, Good as Gone, Hell Ride, Baja, Accelerate, Guilt Trip, Ignite, Smog, Wanderlust, Wildheart, Punk, Double Life, Jet, Drift, Radio, and Big Sky.

WHOLE NEW WORLD - No matter where you’re going, you’ve got every eye look covered. From jewel tones to modern neutrals, this all-in-one eyeshadow palette has everything you need to create subtle looks, add pops of color, and play with brights.

FOR ALL SKIN TONES - We designed every shade in Born to Run to be universally flattering for any skin tone and lifestyle. Whether you’re a weekend escapist or a staycationer, this vegan palette has everything you need.
PRO TIP - Mist your brush with All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray before applying any Born to Run eyeshadow shade to create long-lasting, extra-pigmented effects.
